title: How to Make Potato Pancakes Using Crackers

steps.headline: Crush crackers in food processor or by smashing them with a rolling pin or other heavy object.
Grate potatoes using a food processor grater.
steps.description: You can also grate them finely using a food grater.

steps.headline: Grate or finely chop onion using the food processor blade or a knife.
Add the crushed crackers, eggs, salt and pepper to potato/onion mixture.
Process using the food processor chopper blade, until finely chopped, or mix together in a mixing bowl.
Fry until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with applesauce and sour cream.

text: Crush crackers in food processor or by smashing them with a rolling pin or other heavy object.  Peel potatoes.  Grate potatoes using a food processor grater. You can also grate them finely using a food grater. Grate or finely chop onion using the food processor blade or a knife.  Add the crushed crackers, eggs, salt and pepper to potato/onion mixture.  Process using the food processor chopper blade, until finely chopped, or mix together in a mixing bowl.  Drop spoonfuls into hot oil. Spread thinly. Fry until golden brown on both sides.  Serve with applesauce and sour cream.
